alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 12:22PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan, northeastern Scott and west central Yell Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Echo, or 9 miles north of Waldron, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Paris... Mansfield... Magazine... Subiaco... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mount Magazine... Echo... Barber... Waveland... Lucas... Waltreak... Chismville... Sugar Grove... Driggs... Carolan... Corley... Grayson... Glendale in Logan County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County; Yell Excluding Northwest
